Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

enumDescriptions.None: No IEEE 802.3x flow control is enabled on this port.
enumDescriptions.RX: The link partner can initiate IEEE 802.3x flow control.
enumDescriptions.TX: This station can initiate IEEE 802.3x flow control.
enumDescriptions.TX_RX: This station or the link partner can initiate IEEE 802.3x flow control.

enumDescriptions.Ethernet: The port is capable of connecting to an Ethernet network.
enumDescriptions.FibreChannel: The port is capable of connecting to a Fibre Channel network.
enumDescriptions.InfiniBand: The port is capable of connecting to an InfiniBand network.

enumDescriptions.Down: The port is enabled but link is down.
enumDescriptions.Starting: This link on this interface is starting.  A physical link has been established, but the port is not able to transfer data.
enumDescriptions.Training: This physical link on this interface is training.
enumDescriptions.Up: The port is enabled and link is good (up).

NetDevFuncMaxBWAlloc.description: A maximum bandwidth allocation percentage for a network device functions associated with a port.
NetDevFuncMaxBWAlloc.longDescription: This type shall describe a maximum bandwidth percentage allocation for a network device function associated with a port.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MaxBWAllocPercent.description: The maximum bandwidth allocation percentage allocated to the corresponding network device function instance.
MaxBWAllocPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum bandwidth percentage allocation for the associated network device function.

NetworkDeviceFunction.description: The link to the network device function associated with this bandwidth setting of this network port.
NetworkDeviceFunction.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type NetworkDeviceFunction that represents the network device function associated with this bandwidth setting of this network port.

NetDevFuncMinBWAlloc.description: A minimum bandwidth allocation percentage for a network device functions associated with a port.
NetDevFuncMinBWAlloc.longDescription: This type shall describe a minimum bandwidth percentage allocation for a network device function associated with a port.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MinBWAllocPercent.description: The minimum bandwidth allocation percentage allocated to the corresponding network device function instance.
MinBWAllocPercent.longDescription: This property shall contain the minimum bandwidth percentage allocation for the associated network device function.  The sum total of all minimum percentages shall not exceed 100.

NetworkDeviceFunction.description: The link to the network device function associated with this bandwidth setting of this network port.
NetworkDeviceFunction.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type NetworkDeviceFunction that represents the network device function associated with this bandwidth setting of this network port.

NetworkPort.deprecated: This schema has been deprecated in favor of the Port schema.
NetworkPort.description: The NetworkPort schema describes a network port, which is a discrete physical port that can connect to a network.
NetworkPort.longDescription: This resource shall represent a discrete physical port that can connect to a network in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

ActiveLinkTechnology.longDescription: This property shall contain the configured link technology of this port.

AssociatedNetworkAddresses.description: An array of configured MAC or WWN network addresses that are associated with this network port, including the programmed address of the lowest-numbered network device function, the configured but not active address, if applicable, the address for hardware port teaming, or other network addresses.
AssociatedNetworkAddresses.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of configured network addresses that are associated with this network port, including the programmed address of the lowest-numbered network device function, the configured but not active address if applicable, the address for hardware port teaming, or other network addresses.

CurrentLinkSpeedMbps.longDescription: This property shall contain the current configured link speed of this port.

EEEEnabled.description: An indication of whether IEEE 802.3az Energy-Efficient Ethernet (EEE) is enabled for this network port.
EEEEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether IEEE 802.3az Energy-Efficient Ethernet (EEE) is enabled for this network port.

FCFabricName.description: The FC Fabric Name provided by the switch.
FCFabricName.longDescription: This property shall indicate the FC Fabric Name provided by the switch.

FCPortConnectionType.description: The connection type of this port.
FCPortConnectionType.longDescription: This property shall contain the connection type for this port.

FlowControlConfiguration.description: The locally configured 802.3x flow control setting for this network port.
FlowControlConfiguration.longDescription: This property shall contain the locally configured 802.3x flow control setting for this network port.

FlowControlStatus.description: The 802.3x flow control behavior negotiated with the link partner for this network port (Ethernet-only).
FlowControlStatus.longDescription: This property shall contain the 802.3x flow control behavior negotiated with the link partner for this network port (Ethernet-only).

LinkStatus.description: The status of the link between this port and its link partner.
LinkStatus.longDescription: This property shall contain the link status between this port and its link partner.

MaxFrameSize.description: The maximum frame size supported by the port.
MaxFrameSize.longDescription: This property shall contain the maximum frame size supported by the port.

NetDevFuncMaxBWAlloc.description: An array of maximum bandwidth allocation percentages for the network device functions associated with this port.
NetDevFuncMaxBWAlloc.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of maximum bandwidth allocation percentages for the network device functions associated with this port.

NetDevFuncMinBWAlloc.description: An array of minimum bandwidth allocation percentages for the network device functions associated with this port.
NetDevFuncMinBWAlloc.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of minimum bandwidth percentage allocations for each of the network device functions associated with this port.

NumberDiscoveredRemotePorts.description: The number of ports not on this adapter that this port has discovered.
NumberDiscoveredRemotePorts.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of ports not on this adapter that this port has discovered.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PhysicalPortNumber.description: The physical port number label for this port.
PhysicalPortNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain the physical port number on the network adapter hardware that this network port corresponds to.  This value should match a value visible on the hardware.

PortMaximumMTU.description: The largest maximum transmission unit (MTU) that can be configured for this network port.
PortMaximumMTU.longDescription: This property shall contain the largest maximum transmission unit (MTU) that can be configured for this network port.

SignalDetected.description: An indication of whether the port has detected enough signal on enough lanes to establish a link.
SignalDetected.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the port has detected enough signal on enough lanes to establish a link.

Status.description: The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

SupportedEthernetCapabilities.description: The set of Ethernet capabilities that this port supports.
SupportedEthernetCapabilities.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of zero or more Ethernet capabilities supported by this port.

SupportedLinkCapabilities.description: The link capabilities of this port.
SupportedLinkCapabilities.longDescription: This property shall describe the static capabilities of the port, irrespective of transient conditions such as cabling, interface module presence, or remote link partner status or configuration.

VendorId.description: The vendor Identification for this port.
VendorId.longDescription: This property shall indicate the vendor identification string information as provided by the manufacturer of this port.

WakeOnLANEnabled.description: An indication of whether Wake on LAN (WoL) is enabled for this network port.
WakeOnLANEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether Wake on LAN (WoL) is enabled for this network port.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.ExtenderFabric: This port connection type is an extender fabric port.
enumDescriptions.Generic: This port connection type is a generic fabric port.
enumDescriptions.NPort: This port connects through an N-port to a switch.
enumDescriptions.PointToPoint: This port connects in a point-to-point configuration.
enumDescriptions.PrivateLoop: This port connects in a private loop configuration.
enumDescriptions.PublicLoop: This port connects in a public configuration.

enumDescriptions.EEE: IEEE 802.3az Energy-Efficient Ethernet (EEE) is supported on this port.
enumDescriptions.WakeOnLAN: Wake on LAN (WoL) is supported on this port.

SupportedLinkCapabilities.description: The link capabilities of an associated port.
SupportedLinkCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall describe the static capabilities of an associated port, irrespective of transient conditions such as cabling, interface module presence, or remote link partner status or configuration.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AutoSpeedNegotiation.description: An indication of whether the port is capable of autonegotiating speed.
AutoSpeedNegotiation.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether the port is capable of autonegotiating speed.

CapableLinkSpeedMbps.description: The set of link speed capabilities of this port.
CapableLinkSpeedMbps.longDescription: This property shall contain all of the possible network link speed capabilities of this port.

LinkNetworkTechnology.description: The link network technology capabilities of this port.
LinkNetworkTechnology.longDescription: This property shall contain a network technology capability of this port.

LinkSpeedMbps.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of the CapableLinkSpeedMbps.
LinkSpeedMbps.description: The speed of the link in Mbit/s when this link network technology is active.
LinkSpeedMbps.longDescription: This property shall contain the speed of the link in megabits per second (Mbit/s) units for this port when this link network technology is active.

title: #NetworkPort.v1_4_2.NetworkPort
